raw akas.title: World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman

akas: Seiken Tsukai no World Break (original title)
World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman World-wide (English title)
Holy Swordsman's World Break World-wide (English title) (informal literal title)
akas from release info: Seiken Tsukai no World Break (original title)
World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman World-wide (English title)
Holy Swordsman's World Break World-wide (English title) (informal literal title)

1.title: The Reincarnater

episode of.title: World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Moroha enters Akane Academy, where he and his classmates have each inherited mystical powers from their former lives. There he meets Satsuki and Shizuno, two girls who immediately find themselves drawn to him for various reasons.

2.title: Imbue My Sword, Magic Flame!

episode of.title: World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Moroha and Shizuno are invited to join the renowned Strikers, leaving Satsuki out in the cold. But when a powerful Metaphysical attacks a crowded shopping district, the trio find themselves fighting it all by themselves.

3.title: Witch of the Netherworld

episode of.title: World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: The head of British HQ, Sir Edward Lamperd, comes to Japan to put Moroha's powers to the test. Meanwhile, Shizuno's brother Tadanori tries to advance himself politically by manipulating Moroha and Shizuno.

4.title: White Knight's Fierce Attack

episode of.title: World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: When Shizuno's brother tries to bully her into studying abroad, Moroha intervenes by claiming to have defeated the Dreadnought Class Metaphysical without any assistance. This leads to a high-stakes duel between himself and Sir Edward.

5.title: We Are the Summer

episode of.title: World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: The Strikers go to a small island for a summer training camp, and Satsuki takes it upon herself to become a faster, more capable Savior. Meanwhile, the Head Six are preparing to meet regarding Moroha's suggested promotion to rank S.

6.title: We Are the Swords of Salvation

episode of.title: World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: A gigantic Metaphysical attacks just as the summer training camp is drawing to a close. Some members of the Head Six doubt Moroha's abilities, and they see this attack as the perfect opportunity to force him to prove himself in battle.

7.title: The Silver-haired Alien

episode of.title: World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: A Russian exchange student named Lesya shows up at school and immediately displays an overt romantic interest in Moroha. Shizuno suspects her true motive is of a sinister nature, and she sets out to prove it.

8.title: The Demon Sword and the Holy Sword

episode of.title: World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: Lesya reveals to Moroha that her true intent is sinister after all, as Shizuno uncovers an important discovery about Lesya's past. As Moroha fights to defend himself, Shizuno rushes to convey this news that will affect everyone involved.

9.title: To Siberia

episode of.title: World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Moroha initiates a private war against the Russia branch, with a little help from Angela. His goal is to defeat the Russian Terror without killing anyone, but the Terror has her own brutal ideas about how to stop him.

10.title: Battle at Yekaterinburg

episode of.title: World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: With some help from his friends, Moroha finally faces the Russian Terror on her home turf. But when her Dark Arts turn out to be as powerful as his, it's unclear who will emerge victorious in this clash of titans.

11.title: The Nightmare from the Previous Life

episode of.title: World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: The emergence of a Metaphysical delays Moroha's departure from Russia. Little does anyone realize, a dark specter from his former lives is about to reappear in Japan, forcing everyone there to face it without his aid.

12.title: Beyond the Time

episode of.title: World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: The Saviors fight valiantly in what appears to be a losing battle against an unusually intelligent Metaphysical. When Moroha finally enters the fray, he finds it will take more than his powers alone to emerge victorious.

imdb.plot outline: The scenery takes place in a private high school involving the concept of "saviors." They are known as people who possess awakened memories of their past lives. The story tells of a young boy named Moroha Haimura who comes to this private school. At the school, there are two types of people: Saviors, who fight enemies with weapons and techniques gleaned from the Puraana powers from their own bodies, and Kuroma, who wipe out enemies with magic to manipulate the Maana powers that surpass physics. Moroha Haimura is the first person with past lives of both Shirogane and Kuroma.
imdb.title: World Break: Aria of Curse for a Holy Swordsman
plot: The scenery takes place in a private high school involving the concept of "saviors." They are known as people who possess awakened memories of their past lives. The story tells of a young boy named Moroha Haimura who comes to this private school. At the school, there are two types of people: Saviors, who fight enemies with weapons and techniques gleaned from the Puraana powers from their own bodies, and Kuroma, who wipe out enemies with magic to manipulate the Maana powers that surpass physics. Moroha Haimura is the first person with past lives of both Shirogane and Kuroma.
